text: Rifkin's Festival is a 2020 American Spanish Italian comedy movie directed by Woody Allen and starring Wallace Shawn, Gina Gershon, Christoph Waltz, Elena Anaya, Louis Garrel, Sergi LÃ³pez, Douglas McGrath, Ken Appledorn, Steve Guttenberg. ==Other websites== * Category:2020 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Woody Allen Category:Movies set in Spain
